sentence: Trending News Some Jan. 6 defendants turn to trial by judge instead of jury Biden announces new rule on "ghost guns" aimed at preventing gun crimes Ukrainian girl taken into U.S. border custody moved to shelter Liz Cheney sets personal fundraising record ahead of August primary U.S. processed 9,926 undocumented Ukrainians in last 2 months, data show Bo Erickson Bo Erickson is a reporter covering the White House for CBS News Digital.
title: Biden announces new rule on "ghost guns" aimed at preventing gun crimes
